column1: The Purple Pig////With an expansive menu
column2: we were a tad overwhelmed at where to start initially with so many great options to choose between. Our server was able to help us narrow down some great options. As a party of 5 we ordered 5 plates in addition to to a board. We did one item from each section (veg
column4: etc) but got two under pork (if it's in the name of the restaurant
column5: you know it's the right way to go).
